Title: Germany to locate its three other planned LNG import terminals at Lubmin and Stade
Description: Germany has decided on Lubmin and Stade as the locations for three more floating LNG import terminals, after Wilhelmshaven and Brunsbüttel, as it strives to accelerate the development of LNG infrastructure to help the country wean itself off Russian pipeline gas.
Author: CK

Title: Gail seeks another August LNG cargo, GSPC seeks two September cargoes
Description: India’s state-owned Gail has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on Aug. 25, 26 or 29 to the 17.5 mtpa Dahej LNG receiving terminal, while fellow state-owned firm Gujarat State Petroleum is seeking two cargoes for delivery in September through a tender closing today. Gail’s tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Workers at Prelude FLNG extend industrial action until Aug. 4
Description: Workers at Shell’s 3.6 mtpa Prelude floating LNG facility have extended their industrial action to Aug. 4, which could result in an extended shutdown at the facility.
Author: CK
